item.title: Create your first collection
item.description: Create your first collection This tutorial will guide you through creating your first Open Terms Archive collection. By the end, you’ll have a working collection that tracks changes to a service’s privacy policy. You will also have a basic understanding of how to create a collection. Prerequisites ðŸ”— Node.js is installed on your system. You have basic familiarity with the command line. You know how to use a text editor.
